sessions.name: System Demo
sessions.description: Review the current state of the system and identify areas for improvement.

sessions.name: Inspect & Adapt
sessions.description: Review and demonstrate the system and identify areas for improvement.

sessions.name: Business Context
sessions.description: Business leaders present the context and objectives.

sessions.name: Product Solution/Vision
sessions.description: Product Owners and Solution Architects share the vision and key solutions.

sessions.name: Architecture Vision and Development Practices
sessions.description: Technical leaders provide architectural and development practice guidance.

sessions.name: Planning Context + Q&A
sessions.description: Teams discuss the planning approach and address open questions.

sessions.name: Team Break
sessions.description: Teams create draft plans, identify dependencies, and highlight risks.

sessions.name: Team Breakouts
sessions.description: Continue refining plans and resolving dependencies.

sessions.name: Team Sync + Coach Sync
sessions.description: Teams and coaches align plans and dependencies.

sessions.name: Draft Plan Review
sessions.description: Review draft plans and align with leadership.

sessions.name: Management Review and Planning Adjustments
sessions.description: Leadership reviews plans and provides feedback.

sessions.name: Team Sync/Breakout/3 Amigos Preparation
sessions.description: Prepare for the final day and ensure alignment.

sessions.name: Team Sync + Coach Sync
sessions.description: Teams and coaches align on adjustments.

sessions.name: Final Team Breakout/BO Tour
sessions.description: Ensure all teams have aligned plans for final review.

sessions.name: Team Sync/Standard Business
sessions.description: Address open business or technical items.

sessions.name: Final Plan Review
sessions.description: Finalize and review all team plans with leadership.
Identify risks and vote on confidence in the plan.
sessions.name: ART Risks and Confidence Vote

sessions.description: Discuss learnings from planning and next steps.
sessions.name: Planning Retrospective and Moving Forward

PI_PlanningAndInnovation.name: Innovation Week
PI_PlanningAndInnovation.description: A dedicated week for innovation, experimentation, and learning.
